comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for "Third-party storage" in various UI components, such as radio buttons and toggle parameters, indicating a storage option for files. It appears in dialog windows and page settings for data management and backup features.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Üçüncü Tərəf Yaddaşı" is a literal translation, "Third-party storage" often refers to a service or cloud storage solution. A more accurate translation would reflect this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Üçüncü Tərəf Saxlanma" or "Xarici Saxlanma Xidməti" depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Памет за трети страни" is a literal translation, it doesn't quite capture the nuance of "Third-party storage." It implies storage *belonging* to third parties, rather than storage *provided by* third parties. A more accurate translation might focus on the service aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Съхранение от трети страни" or "Съхранение при трети страни" to better convey the meaning of a service provided by a third party.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Drittanbieter" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Third-party storage". "Drittanbieter" means 'third-party provider'. "Third-party storage" refers to storage services provided by a company other than the main service provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "Externer Speicher" or "Speicher von Drittanbietern".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Αποθήκευση τρίτων" is a literal translation of "Third-party storage," it lacks the flow and common phrasing used in Greek when referring to third-party services. A more natural and widely understood translation would be "Αποθήκευση από τρίτους" or "Εναπόθεση σε τρίτους".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Αποθήκευση από τρίτους" or "Εναπόθεση σε τρίτους".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Moteur de stockage tiers' translates more literally to 'Third-party storage engine'. 'Moteur' implies an engine or system, whereas the English term 'storage' is a more direct description of the functionality.

The Lao translation "ພາກສ່ວນທີສາມ ການ​ເກັບ​ຮັກ​ສາ " is a literal translation of "third party storage" but doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'third-party storage' in a technical context. It could be misinterpreted. A more natural and accurate translation might be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ການ​ເກັບ​ຮັກສາ​ຂອງ​ບຸກຄົນ​ທີສາມ" or "ບ່ອນ​ເກັບ​ຮັກສາ​ຂອງ​ພາກສ່ວນ​ທີສາມ" depending on the exact context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Przechowywanie przez strony trzecie" is a rather literal and slightly awkward translation of "Third-party storage." A more natural and commonly used translation would be more concise.
While "Armazenamento Proveniente de Terceiros" is technically correct, it's a bit verbose and less natural than other options for 'Third-party storage'. It sounds overly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Armazenamento de Terceiros" or "Solução de Armazenamento de Terceiros" depending on context. "Armazenamento de Terceiros" is a more common and concise translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Aplicație de stocare de la terțe' translates to 'Third-party storage application'. It adds 'application' which isn't present in the English term. A more accurate translation would simply be 'Stocare de la terți'.

The Sinhala translation "තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ආචයනය" is not the most accurate or natural translation of "Third-party storage". "ආචයනය" translates more closely to 'storage' or 'warehouse' in a physical sense, while 'third-party storage' refers to a cloud service or external data storage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more appropriate translation might be "තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගබඩාව" (Third-party warehouse/storage) or "තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගබඩා සేవ" (Third-party storage service).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Складиште треће стране" is technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and clunky in Serbian. A more natural and common translation for "Third-party storage" would be "Додата складиште" or "Складиште спољашњег пружаоца услуга".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Додата складиште" or "Складиште спољашњег пружаоца услуга".
